title: A Second Shot of Coffee with Jesus
description: The wildly popular online comic Coffee with Jesus, described by Library Journal as offering "disarmingly funny reflections on human failings and faith," is back with a venti-sized second volume. Find yourself in your favorite characters, and laugh with Jesus at the absurdities of our world and the ways we walk in it. Follow your favorite characters as they honestly engage with Jesus about their successes and failures and wants and needs, effectively showing what conversation with God or prayer might look like. These poignant and pointed visual vignettes are rife with good theology and will have you laughing for days."
author: David Wilkie
